Source Notes: Pergunta informal que serve como cumprimento todo o dia.
Target Notes: Neutral greeting you can use all day.
Most common way to get someone’s attention in England.

Target: Could you speak a bit slower, please?
Pronunciation (IPA): /kʊd juː spiːk ə bɪt ˈsləʊə, pliːz/
Pronunciation (Simplified): /kud yoo speek ə bit ˈsloh-ə, pleez/

Source: O meu português não é muito bom.

Target: How do you say … in English?
Could we get the bill, please?

Source: Onde fica a casa de banho?
Target Notes: “Toilet” is the usual word in the UK; “loo” is very informal.
